text: Hello looking for team members I am a graphic/web/UI&UX Designer front-end developer

Hey Deanna if this is in relation to the Themes Hackathon, I would x-post this to the <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> channel we have.

If this is in regards to just general employment, we also have a <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel you can post in as well :slightly_smiling_face:

Hi everyone! I am doing a code challenge that involves HubSpot so i figured I would pop in and say hi! My name is daniel and I am addicted to Among Us. So far I am loving the development environment! How has everyone’s day been?
I don’t know Daniel…. seems kinda sus… :smile:
Hoping someone here has experience with getting an email out of the SPAM? All our transactional emails are going to the SPAM folder and sendgrid can’t give us any reason besides the shared IP address
Hi I’m here how can i help?
hey mate, we have a number of transactional emails going from our application through Sendgrid, and all new user registration emails go straight to spam
